short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhanced productivity in the browser with quick navigation through your tabs, bookmarks and history.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your user experience with TidyTabs - Tab Sorter. The extension helps you organize your tabs and find the one in a dozen open tabs.

TidyTabs covers the control not only over tabs, but also bookmarks and recently closed websites.

Main features are:

* Search through open tabs and browser history
* Better UX to control your bookmarks
* Multiple links opening
